description.value:
Small Leather Pouches of "Tempest Stones", rocks fused into glass in fierce lightning storms wrapped in prayer scripts. Can be: Amulet of Might (+2 to Strength after all other modifiers), Victory Scripture (+2 WS when fightning an enemy in single melee combat), or Guardian Amulet (Counts as a Charm).

Requirements

Deathwatch Initiate may start with one appropriate Chapter Trapping. Chapter: Storm Wardens (alternative is a Sacris Claymore in Weapons Section)

Effect: Initiated

Notes: -
